name: @oldgabriel/skeleton-react
description: Skeleton React template by Gabriel Cirqueira
author: Gabriel Cirqueira

scripts.release:patch: git add . && git commit -m 'Preparing patch release' && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: git add . && git commit -m 'Preparing minor release' && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: git add . && git commit -m 'Preparing major release' && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push origin main --tags
